group_1.narration: After meeting Himena, after several days @passed with no contact from her, @a strange occurrence happened on the Internet...

group_1.textRight: I don't know, but my whole social media feed @is being flooded with just one post...
It's like many accounts are posting all at once...

group_1.narration: It contained the following:@Proof of the bullying that led to a boy's death.@Real names and photos of the students involved.@The methods of bullying.@The school's weak response to it...
That alone was shocking, @but what really got me was a message @posted separately from the accusation post.
[textBlack:All those who killed him]@[textBlack:need to live on]@[textBlack:and continue to suffer.]
[textBlack:I just can't accept that you @who did this get to live on while @Hiko does not.]
[textBlack:Even if society and the laws forgive you, @I never will. @I will always hate you, @and don't you forget that.]
[textBlack:This cutie is leaving this world @just one step ahead of you. @Bye-bye!]
[textBlack:Signed: Himena Aika]

group_1.textRight: Himena...?! When she said she wouldn't @be forgiven... This...!

group_1.textLeft: What? You know her...? [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]But, all this...she...

group_1.narration: *Beep♪*[se:7106_telmail]
"If you're watching this, it means this cutie's @no longer a part of this world. Kyaha★ @I've always wanted to say something like that."
"So if you've had your eye online, @you've probably learned by now that Hiko @was bullied to suicide right here, @in this very spot."
"Normally, I would've followed Hiko right away. @For a moment, I thought about, like, @killing all of his bullies, too, @but I chose not to."

"Because killing them would end their pain, @and I couldn't let them be forgiven so easily. @So I decided I'd take all the evidence and @put it on blast so they'd suffer as murderers @to the end of their days."
"After meeting Irorin, though, I started feeling hope. @Like maybe she'd be able to make her future come true...@because she has such a clearcut desire to see @to everyone's happiness."
"But I'm sorry. I can only be happy with Hiko. @I can't breathe in a world without him... @So this is the only way for me, okay?"
"...I really wanted to live on with you, Hiko. @I wanted us to grow up together, and get married, @and become parents someday...@but that dream that will never come true now."
"I'll get my happily ever after in the next round! @So Irorin, please set the stage for @everyone's happy future before my return.★ @We'll meet again in the next life...Irorin."

group_1.textCenter: But...I know...I have to look forward...
And hey, there's not much you can do @if you're depressed, yeah?
Looking backwards won't get you anywhere.

group_1.narration: Everyone wants to be happy, @but our feelings are so different, @and we don't understand one another.
And even if we do understand each other, @our problems aren't the kind @that can be solved just like that.
I honestly don't know how much of an impact @Himena's callout will have...
Even if it catches fire for a moment, @it'll all be inevitably forgotten @within the next few months... @It's not a fundamental solution @to the problem of happiness...
And I think Himena knew that, too. @Which is why she entrusted me with her future.
That's why I don't want to give up. @I want to carry Himena's feelings and thoughts.
I've come to be able to see everyone's @happiness and sorrows, @and I'm sure I can do something @for the happiness of everyone...
Yes. @I have to start with what's within my reach.
...Because if I do nothing at all, @I'll only come to regret it...
